titles.title: Extending condolences to the family, friends, and loved ones of the late Mr. Eugene Gilmer.
Extending condolences to the family, friends, and loved ones of the late Mr. Eugene Gilmer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: Extends condolences to the family, friends, and loved ones of the late Eugene Gilmer (Detroit public school system educator and administrator and Chair of the Board of Directors of Detroit's Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History).
